formulas.name: UnitPurchasedDropPrice
formulas.expression: 'Unit was purchased' + TEXT({!$Record.CL_Post_Age__c}) + 'days ago. Drop price accordingly. If 180 days old, consider auction.'

recordCreates.name: createTaskForLocation
recordCreates.label: createTaskForLocation

value.stringValue: Run Vague Location task, then update storage location on MT, CL, and IC. Task BN to update FB location for owned units.

recordCreates.name: FB_and_CL_Location_update
recordCreates.label: FB and CL Location update

value.stringValue: [Sandip] Location on this unit was updated; make required changes to CL and update CL Post Date field

recordCreates.name: No_of_Photos_on_GD_Chnaged
recordCreates.label: No of Photos on GD Chnaged

value.stringValue: Number of photos on GD changed. Plz organize pics/remove unnecessary pics, update pics on MT, IC, and CL. Task WH to update FB photos if owned.

recordCreates.name: Price_Drop_MC_Email
recordCreates.label: Price Drop MC Email

recordCreates.name: Relist_Unit
recordCreates.label: Relist Unit

value.stringValue: Check with unit owner whether it is ready to be relisted. If it is, relist it and UNCHECK the Unlist checkbox. IF it is not, ask when to relist and reassign this task for that date.

recordCreates.name: Task_for_Add_Update_IC_listing
recordCreates.label: Task for Add/Update IC listing

value.stringValue: If this unit has an Iron Connect listing, please update location. If it does not have an IC listing, please post in Team Z Group Chat and @post CM/HB/MJ to identify whether it should be posted on IC.

recordCreates.name: Task_for_Owned_Unit_Price_Drop
recordCreates.label: Task for Owned Unit Price Drop

recordCreates.name: Task_for_Unlisting_unit_from_all_advertising
recordCreates.label: Task for Unlisting unit from all advertising

value.stringValue: Unlist unit from MT, CL, and all other iron sites. Task Collin to "remove from FB if appropriate" from the unit page.

recordCreates.name: Task_to_Confirm_availability
recordCreates.label: Task to Confirm availability

value.stringValue: Confirm unit availability; see if anything else available for sale; deactivate unit if not available.

recordCreates.name: Task_to_Renew_CL_Listing
recordCreates.label: Task to Renew CL Listing

value.stringValue: CL listing for this unit was added 30 days ago, please renew listing.

recordCreates.name: Task_to_send_matching_mail_via_Walkers_Acc
recordCreates.label: Task to send matching mail via Walkers Acc

value.stringValue: Log into Walker's SF account and send matching on this unit from there.

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_Complete_Unit_Details
recordCreates.label: Task to update Complete Unit Details

value.stringValue: Complete Unit Details - use "Required information for owned units" doc as reference.

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_List_on_Iron_Connect
recordCreates.label: Task to update List on Iron Connect

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_Market_on_MT_and_Iron_Sites
recordCreates.label: Task to update Market on MT and Iron Sites

value.stringValue: Ensure unit marketed on MT and spot-check other IronSites to ensure it's listed accurately

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_MC_ID_End_Users
recordCreates.label: Task to update MC/ID - End Users

value.stringValue: [Reassign to BN with MC list attached] End User Mailchimp / ID calls- (MC: 2+ opens, top 5, ID: most recent 5)

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_Obtain_review_organize_photos_videos
recordCreates.label: Task to update Obtain, review, organize photos/videos

value.stringValue: Ensure full set of good photos is provided via inspection or via site contact. Remove not good/auction looking photos to Confidential Information folder.

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_Post_on_CL
recordCreates.label: Task to update Post on CL

value.stringValue: Market on Craigslist in the city/region where unit is located; create follow-up task for 30-days out to repost.

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_Send_first_Mailchimp
recordCreates.label: Task to update Send first Mailchimp

value.stringValue: Send UNADVERTISED Mailchimp to end users and equipment sellers; EXCLUDE account purchased from

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_Serial_number_shared_available
recordCreates.label: Task to update Serial number shared/available

value.stringValue: Put Serial Number Photos in Online Photos folder, and on MT. Put full serial from the serial plate in Serial Number field on Unit Page.

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_Set_Sell_Pricing
recordCreates.label: Task to update Set Sell Pricing

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_SF_Dealer_Email
recordCreates.label: Task to update SF Dealer Email

value.stringValue: Send to dealers via SF email

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_Shipping_dimensions
recordCreates.label: Task to update Shipping dimensions

value.stringValue: Obtain shipping dimensions from either inspection report or specalog. Put in Shipping Dims field in the Freight and Transport section of Unit Page.

recordCreates.name: Task_to_update_year_on_MT_CL_IC
recordCreates.label: Task to update year on MT, CL, IC

value.stringValue: The year on this unit has changed; update MT, CL, and IC (ONLY IF UNIT IS LISTED IN THOSE PLACES)

recordCreates.name: Unlist_nonactive_Unit
recordCreates.label: Unlist nonactive Unit

value.stringValue: Unit has been deactivated, unlist from MT, CL, and IC. Task BN to unlist from FB if owned.

recordCreates.name: Update_Craigslist_price_to_show_advert_retail_price
recordCreates.label: Update Craigslist price to show advert retail price

value.stringValue: [IF CL LISTING IS ACTIVE] Update Craigslist Pricing to reflect Starting Advertised Retail Price; change CL Post date to today

recordCreates.name: Update_Iron_Connect_Price_to_show_advert_retail_price
recordCreates.label: Update Iron Connect Price to show advert retail price

value.stringValue: [IF IC LISTING IS ACTIVE] Update Iron Connect pricing to reflect the Starting Advertised Retail Price

recordCreates.name: Update_MT_price_to_show_advert_retail_price
recordCreates.label: Update MT price to show advert retail price

value.stringValue: [IF MT LISTING IS ACTIVE] Update Pricing on MT to reflect Starting Advertised Retail Price

recordCreates.name: update_Unit_Details
recordCreates.label: update Unit Details

value.stringValue: Update unit details on MT, IC, and CL; task BN to update unit details on FB if owned unit

recordUpdates.name: update_Storage_Address_to_Bryant_Address
recordUpdates.label: update Storage Address to Bryant Address

recordUpdates.name: update_Storage_Address_to_Sulphur_Springs
recordUpdates.label: update Storage Address to Sulphur Springs
